--b1_ea33e07a37f4632033dbf6bbcf60ec37
Content-Type: text/plain; charset = "iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

TODAY! One Day Sale to Benefit Music4More.org!

[1]

RIGHT NOW!

Wednesday, May 18th

One Day Sale

to Benefit

[2]Music4More!

Dear Friends of WTSO,

This winter, we asked you to tell us about your favorite charities. The idea:
we would consider your feedback and choose non-profits that could benefit from
our generous and active customer base, one at a time, through a One Day Sale.
During each sale, a portion of proceeds would go to that special charity
partner. As a result, we would feel good. You would feel good. And the
non-profit group would get a solid donation to help further its mission.

We are proud to announce that our One Day Sale will benefit a wonderful charity
called Music 4 More.

[3]

Here’s how you can get involved … It couldn’t be simpler:

Our ONE DAY SALE

is going on RIGHT NOW!

A portion of the sales from this event

will be donated directly to Music 4 More.

All you have to do is BUY LOTS OF WINE TODAY!

We will have SIX different wines

offered one-at-a-time throughout the day.

Not only will you be sipping great grape,

you’ll be getting good karma.

Music 4 More is a 501 (c) (3) charity organization providing financial and
in-kind resources to sustain and foster under-funded music programs in schools
and communities across the United States. It strives to make music education
available to all children with the belief that through music education,
students become well-rounded emotionally and intellectually mature adults. By
maintaining a support system for these programs, Music 4 More helps to
contribute to a brighter future for our society. You can learn more about Music
4 More and its programs at [4]www.music4more.org.

As we spoke with Music 4 More and learned about the cool projects and hip
musicians involved in the charity, we decided to do even more with them. We
can’t take the cork out of the bottle just yet, but just imagine singers,
songwriters and WTSO at a city near you! More details come soon.

For now, think back to your school days and remember what music meant to you.
Pull out that old trumpet. Check out your glee club picture in the high school
yearbook. Dig up your band uniform and reminisce. On May 18th, we hope you will
log onto WTSO.com and buy some wine to help make music education available to
all children, everywhere! It’s important!

Thank You from your WTSO team,

Joe, Elliot, Jamie, Justin, Julie, Gabby, Stephanie, Sarah, and Marguerite

Never Miss Another Great Wine from WTSO!

Follow us! Get 'Appy with WTSO!

[5][jpeg] [6]   [jpeg] [7]

*Search for "WTSO" in the Android Market or the Apple App Store for our Apps.

References

1. http://www.wtso.com/
2. http://www.music4more.org/
3. http://www.music4more.org/
4. http://www.music4more.org/
5. http://www.twitter.com/wtsowines
6. http://www.facebook.com/wtsowines
7. http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/wtso-for-iphone/id398337947?mt=8

This message was sent to wineflashapp@gmail.com from:
Wines Till Sold Out | Rt 73 and Hylton Rd | Pennsauken, NJ 08110

Manage Your Subscription:
http://app.icontact.com/icp/mmail-mprofile.pl?r=42712281&l=2337&s=B410&m=377227&c=560143

Send To a Friend: 
http://app.icontact.com/icp/core/message/forward?m=377227&s=42712281&c=B410&cid=560143



--b1_ea33e07a37f4632033dbf6bbcf60ec37

<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="color: #693269;"><strong><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 28px;"><span style="font-style: italic;">Wednesday, May 18th</span></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="color: #693269;"><strong><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 28px;"><span style="font-style: italic;">One Day Sale</span></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="color: #693269;"><strong><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 28px;"><span style="font-style: italic;">to Benefit</span></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<a href="http://www.music4more.org" style="color:#55aadd;"><span style="color: #693269;"><strong><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 28px;"><span style="font-style: italic;">Music4More!</span></span></span></strong></span></a></p>

	&nbsp;</p>

<div style="" class=""><table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="word-wrap:break-word;table-layout:fixed;"><tbody><tr><td style="color:#7f7f7f;font-family:'Trebuchet MS';font-size:12px;">
<p style="margin-left:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Dear Friends of WTSO,</span></span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">This winter, we asked you to tell us about your favorite charities. The idea: we would consider your feedback and choose non-profits that could benefit from our generous and active customer base, one at a time, through a One Day Sale. During each sale, a portion of proceeds would go to that special charity partner. As a result, we would feel good. You would feel good. And the non-profit group would get a solid donation to help further its mission.</span></span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">We are proud to announce that our One Day Sale will benefit a wonderful charity called Music&nbsp;4 More. </span></span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<a href="http://www.music4more.org" style="color:#55aadd;"><span style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;"><img alt="" src="http://staticapp.icpsc.com/icp/loadimage.php/mogile/560143/671f83ba7193a27060c6bdeb95da7b68/image/jpeg" style="margin: 0px; border: 0px solid transparent; width: 195px; height: 95px;" width="195" height="95"></span></span></a></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Here&rsquo;s how you can get involved &hellip; It couldn&rsquo;t be simpler:</span></span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 20px;"><span style="color: #693269;"><strong><strong>Our ONE DAY SALE </strong></strong></span></span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 20px;"><span style="color: #693269;"><strong><strong>is going on RIGHT NOW!</strong></strong></span></span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 20px;"><span style="color: #693269;"><strong><strong>A portion of the sales from this event </strong></strong></span></span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 20px;"><span style="color: #693269;"><strong><strong>will be donated directly to Music 4 More.</strong></strong></span></span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 20px;"><span style="color: #693269;"><strong><strong>All you have to do is BUY LOTS OF WINE TODAY!</strong></strong></span></span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 20px;"><span style="color: #693269;"><strong><strong>We will have SIX different wines </strong></strong></span></span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 20px;"><span style="color: #693269;"><strong><strong>offered one-at-a-time throughout the day.</strong></strong></span></span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 20px;"><span style="color: #693269;"><strong><strong>Not only will you be sipping great grape, </strong></strong></span></span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 20px;"><span style="color: #693269;"><strong><strong>you&rsquo;ll be getting good karma.</strong></strong></span></span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;"><strong>Music 4 More is a 501 (c) (3) charity organization providing financial and in-kind resources to sustain and foster under-funded music programs in schools and communities across the United States.</strong> It strives to make music education available to all children with the belief that through music education, students become well-rounded emotionally and intellectually mature adults. By maintaining a support system for these programs, Music 4 More helps to contribute to a brighter future for our society. You can learn more about Music 4 More and its programs at </span><span style="color: #693269;"><em><strong><a href="http://www.music4more.org/" style="color:#55aadd;">www.music4more.org</a></strong></em></span><span style="color: #000000;">.</span></span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">As we spoke with Music 4 More and learned about the cool projects and hip musicians involved in the charity, we decided to do even more with them. We can&rsquo;t take the cork out of the bottle just yet, but just imagine singers, songwriters and WTSO at a city near you! More details come soon.</span></span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">For now, think back to your school days and remember what music meant to you. Pull out that old trumpet. Check out your glee club picture in the high school yearbook. Dig up your band uniform and reminisce. On May 18th, we hope you will log onto WTSO.com and buy some wine to help make music education available to all children, everywhere! It&rsquo;s important!</span></span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Thank You from your WTSO team,</span></span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Joe, Elliot, Jamie, Justin, Julie, Gabby, Stephanie, Sarah, and Marguerite</span></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
</td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	<span style="color: #000000;">*Search for "WTSO" in the Android Market or the Apple App Store for our Apps.</span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;margin-right:0;margin-top:0;padding:0;">
	&nbsp;</p>
</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
									
								</td>

</td>
			</tr>
